sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REPEALING in law, the revoking or annulling of a ſtatute or the like.

No act of parliament ſhall be repealed the ſame ſeffion in which it was made. A deed or will may be repealed in part, and ſtand good ſor the reft. It is held that a pardon of felony may be repealed on diſproving the ſuggeſtion thereof.
